sources.title: Defenders of the Law
sources.description: With the aid of a corrupt city politician gangsters have complete control of the city . . . until a cop infiltrates the gang.

metadata.Plot: A gang of racketeers, with the aid of a high-ranking city official has control of a big-city, and the police plant an undercover cop to gather evidence against the hoodlums - except the police keep telling the wrong person what they are up to.
metadata.Writer: Hampton Del Ruth, Louis E. Heifetz
metadata.Actors: Catherine Dale Owen, John Holland, Robert Gleckler
